participant_1.background: i am a vegan. i will graduate from high school in two years. i like riding horses. my bedroom is purple and lime green.

participant_2.background: i've a german shepherd named barnaby. i am employed by the us postal service. my favorite color is grey. i'm terrified of scorpions. my father drove a car for nascar.

content.text: Hey! How is your day? I like to ride horses and I love to ride horses
